items.title: Charlton v Coventry, Derby v Middlesbrough, and more: Football League ‚Äì live
items.summary: ‚öΩ Updates from the 3pm GMT New Year‚Äôs Day kick-offs ‚öΩ Live scores | Tables | Follow us on Bluesky | Email Niall ‚ÄúYou mentioned second-bottom Newport‚Äôs visit to leaders Bromley ‚Äì just above them there‚Äôs a ding-dong in my old stamping ground of Shrewsbury, with fourth-bottom Town hosting third-bottom Bristol Rovers in the first (of what may be many) big relegation six-pointer of 2026,‚Äù writes Jeremy Boyce. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm predicting a festive 0-1 and the second managerial departure of 2026 (Michael Appleton). Cheers!‚Äù Full time in the early kick-off, and it‚Äôs finished Blackburn 0-2 Wrexham. Sam Smith opened the scoring before Ollie Rathbone smashed in an early goal-of-the-year contender for the visitors, who climb to eighth in the table. Continue reading...

items.title: Ollie Rathbone‚Äôs sublime volley helps Wrexham brush aside woeful Blackburn
items.summary: Rovers slump to 2-0 defeat after insipid home display Sam Smith also scores for visitors as they rise to eighth Ollie Rathbone marked his first league start of the campaign with a goal-of-the-season contender as Wrexham brushed aside Blackburn 2-0 to rack up their third straight Championship win. Phil Parkinson‚Äôs side were without an away win in eight outings and made the trip to Ewood Park without the injured duo Kieffer Moore and Josh Windass. But Sam Smith and Rathbone deputised to devastating effect as Wrexham flew out of the traps and Smith finished clinically in the 11th minute for his second goal of the season. This report will update later. Continue reading...

items.title: Wrexham boost playoff chances, sink Blackburn
items.summary: A stunning volley from Ollie Rathbone helped Wrexham to a 2-0 win over Blackburn Rovers.

items.title: Crew names Rydstr√∂m to replace Nancy as coach
items.summary: Henrik Rydstr√∂m was hired Wednesday as coach of MLS's Columbus Crew.

items.title: Modric: Mourinho at Madrid 'made Ronaldo cry'
items.summary: Croatia and AC Milan midfielder Luka Modric said on Wednesday that Jose Mourinho was such a tough manager during their time at Real Madrid that he once reduced star player Cristiano Ronaldo to tears.

items.title: Napoli 'formality' to keep Man United's H√∏jlund
items.summary: Napoli sporting director Giovanni Manna considers Rasmus H√∏jlund s permanent transfer from Manchester United a "formality".

items.title: VI Live: Milan van Ewijk kent bliksemstart van 2026
items.summary: Namens de redactie van VI nogmaals de beste wensen! Op deze nieuwjaarsdag is er traditioneel voetbal uit de Premier League. Uiteraard volgen we dat in deze VI Live allemaal op de voet.. Veel plezier.

items.title: Gebroken liefde: het enerverende voetballeven van Lex Schoenmaker
items.summary: Lex Schoenmaker (78) is nog altijd Europees topscorer aller tijden van Feyenoord, maar bovenal een icoon van ADO Den Haag. Dat die club hem dit jaar, na ruim vijftig jaar wederzijdse liefde, koel aan de kant zette, deed veel pijn. Toch geniet hij van de opmars in de KKD.

items.title: Maresca leaves Chelsea after turbulent end to 2025
items.summary: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca leaves his role with the club fifth in the Premier League - 15 points adrift of leaders Arsenal.

items.title: Co-commentator in Nederland? 'Kieft was echt geweldig, man'
items.summary: In sommige andere landen gebeurt het wel, in Nederland niet: co-commentaar. Volgens ESPN-verslaggever Vincent Schildkamp is er maar √©√©n iemand die het goed kan en dat is Wim Kieft. Mogelijk keert het toch snel voor eventjes terug: Wytse van der Goot en Rafael van der Vaart gaan het een keer samen proberen bij een wedstrijd op Ziggo Sport.

items.title: Dit is het schema van de achtste finale van de Afrika Cup
items.summary: In slechts elf dagen tijd is de groepsfase van de Afrika Cup afgewerkt. Na twee rustdagen gaat het toernooi zaterdag verder met de achtste finale. We zetten de wedstrijden op een rij.

items.title: Desastreuze Afrika Cup-deelname loopt in Gabon heel hoog op
items.summary: De kansloze uitschakeling van Gabon op de Afrika Cup heeft in eigen land voor flinke gevolgen gezorgd. De minister van Sport sprak zich op televisie stevig uit over de staf en spelers en kondigde harde maatregelen aan. Snel moest die boodschap ook weer verwijderd worden.

items.title: Chelsea confirm Enzo Maresca exit amid poor Premier League run
items.summary: Chelsea confirmed Thursday they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

items.title: Gabon ditch Aubameyang and suspend national team after ‚Äòdisgraceful‚Äô Afcon
items.summary: Coach Thierry Mouyouma also sacked by government Veteran defender Bruno Ecuele Manga ditched too Gabon‚Äôs government has announced the suspension of the national football team, the sacking of their coach and the kicking of Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang off the squad in the wake of three defeats at the Africa Cup of Nations finals. Gabon‚Äôs acting sports minister announced on television the suspension of the national team after they finished last in their group and were eliminated from the tournament in Morocco. items.title: Man Utd have Mateta interest with club also monitoring Rennes defender Jacquet
items.summary: Manchester United have a long-term interest in Crystal Palace striker Jean-Philippe Mateta.

items.title: Enzo Maresca leaves Chelsea after holding talks over Manchester City move
items.summary: Italian departs Stamford Bridge role after 18 months Maresca told bosses he discussed replacing Guardiola Enzo Maresca‚Äôs shock departure at Chelsea came after he informed the club that he had held talks with figures associated to Manchester City over replacing Pep Guardiola. Chelsea have been weighed down by uncertainty ever since cracks in Maresca‚Äôs relationship with the board became apparent last month, but there is a feeling at Stamford Bridge that the Italian was looking to engineer an exit before a parting of the ways was confirmed on Thursday morning. Continue reading...

items.title: Coventry, Ipswich & Watford lead | EFL on Sky LIVE!
From Sehitler to Armstrong: 10 female footballers set for breakthrough in 2026
items.summary: Today‚Äôs newsletter looks at 10 superlative talents who are ready to take the next step in the coming 12 months Alara Sehitler, Bayern Munich and Germany (19): Sehitler‚Äôs transition into Bayern Munich‚Äôs first team has come as little surprise and the creative midfielder has established herself as a strong impact player for Jos√© Barcala‚Äôs side. She has three Frauen Bundesliga goals this season and sparked Bayern‚Äôs comeback against Arsenal in the Champions League. After making her senior debut for Germany in November 2024, she will be looking to establish herself as a regular for their upcoming 2027 World Cup qualifiers. Giulia Galli, Roma and Italy (17): Galli is widely regarded as one of the best young Italian talents to emerge for a long time and became Roma‚Äôs youngest player to make her Serie A debut in May 2024, aged 16 and one month. Establishing herself in the senior squad this season, she scored her first club goal in September and has featured in the Champions League. After starring in Italy‚Äôs sensational run to the semi-finals of last summer‚Äôs Under-17 Euros, the talented forward played a significant role at the subsequent Under-17 World Cup, picking up the bronze boot. She will surely feature at this autumn‚Äôs Under-20 World Cup. Continue reading...
